title: Geizhals Price Comparison Scraper
description: Scrape product listings, prices, specifications, and merchant offers from Geizhals.eu price comparison platform. Provide category or search query to start scraping.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Geizhals URL to start scraping from. Examples: https://geizhals.eu/?cat=hvent (category), https://geizhals.eu/?fs=dyson (search), https://geizhals.de/?cat=nb (German notebooks).

minPrice.title: Minimum Price (optional)
minPrice.description: Filter products with price greater than or equal to this value (in EUR).

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price (optional)
maxPrice.description: Filter products with price less than or equal to this value (in EUR).

collectDetails.title: Collect Product Details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens product detail pages to extract full specifications, offers, and ratings. Disable for faster scraping of basic listing data.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Number of Products
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of products to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum Number of Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of listing pages to visit (Geizhals uses pagination).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings to avoid rate limiting and blocks. Residential proxies recommended for reliable scraping.
